## Code Quality Checklist

<!-- Verify all items before submitting -->

### Required Checks ✅

- [ ] Code follows Google-style docstrings
- [ ] All functions have type hints
- [ ] Pylint score ≥ 7.0 (`make lint`)
- [ ] MyPy type checking passes (`make mypy`)
- [ ] Bandit security checks pass (`make bandit`)
- [ ] All tests pass (`make test`)
- [ ] Pre-commit hooks pass (`pre-commit run --all-files`)

### Code Quality

- [ ] No generic `Exception` catching (use specific exceptions)
- [ ] No nested exception handling
- [ ] Code is modular and follows project architecture
- [ ] No hardcoded values (use config or constants)
- [ ] Proper logging added where appropriate

### Documentation

- [ ] Code comments added for complex logic
- [ ] README updated (if needed)
- [ ] DEVELOPMENT.md updated (if needed)
- [ ] Docstrings include examples (if applicable)
